lines.text: Did you ever speak ten words to a cute number without hinting that she was the most beautiful girl in the world?
Marian, I always start off conservative like that and then I work up. That system's been the secret of my success.
Keep on using that system and you'll find yourself where a lot of fellas do.
Where's that?
Engaged to marry a girl without even having to mention the subject.
Oh my gosh! Don't women ever know when you're kiddin'?
Not when they're told they're beautiful by anything wearing pants.
Women are worse than I thought.
I declare nowadays the young folks feel so old and the old folks feel so young.
How do you have a girl crazy about you but not too crazy?
People don't like people just because they're perfect. The girls seem to like you and heaven knows you're no rose geranium.
Your father's late tonight. You know, he's been acting strange lately. I hope he's not going to have a nervous breakdown.
Well what's the matter with you son? I thought I was being pretty generous. After all, we owe the world something.
Yeah but... do you think the world deserves it?
You can always handle Polly.
I used to think so but overconfidence ruined me.
Say you sound like one of those crafty cookies.
Sheila, how about a little huddle tonight?
Oh you mean a giraffe party?
Giraffe?
Well a giraffe has a long neck.
